rules_text:
Whenever Leyline Leecher attacks, you may pay {1}. If you do, integrate target card from a graveyard. [i](Exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
Leyline Leecher gets +1/+0 and has flying as long as an instant or sorcery card is integrated onto it.
notes:
!canoncard Scavenging Harpy
 101: Integrating is now optional.
